job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: This individual will work to monitor system health, investigate and troubleshoot delivery failures and/or related production issues, escalate issues as needed and take part in an on-call rotation (roughly every 5-6 weeks). The main focus of this role will be to monitor batch and real-time processing and support overall production support activity as well as aid in the automation of manual tasks.<br><br>• 3-5 years of operations experience with large-scale, high-availability distributed systems<br>• Application/Platform production support experience<br>• SQL/Oracle and UNIX functional proficiency<br>• An understanding of programming – java, javascript, web development, etc.<br>• On-call support experience with a critical platform<br>• Familiarity with Batch/Scheduled job execution and troubleshooting<br>• File Transfer Protocol (FTP) experience<br>• Scripting and automation experience<br>• Healthcare EDI/ANSI/X12 industry knowledge<br>• Splunk, New Relic, Solar Winds or other enterprise monitoring tool experience
